name: Boneless Pizza
description:
Recent breakthroughs in technology have enabled us to create a pizza that is finally boneless. Thanks to our dedicated users, the epidemic of bone-in pizzas is finally cured!

How to play:
Swipe left to box the boneless pizzas, and swipe right to throw away the bone-in pizzas. Beat your highscore as the endless stream of "boneless" pizzas becomes faster and faster.

If you swipe the wrong way or let a pizza fall off the end of the conveyor belt, its game over. Join us in this revolutionary breakthrough.
